titles: An earnest call to the people of England to beware of the temptations of the regicide. Ludlow, to contract the guilt of the murther of King Charles the First, by a conceit that the shedding of that royal bloud was no murther, but an act of justice.
author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Charles I, 1625-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
